mapper.select: SELECT yi.id, yi.`name`, yi.description, yi.price, yi.num, yi.type_id, yi.production_date, yi.production_place, yi.guarantee_date, yi.extent, yi.create_time, yi.create_by, yi.update_time, yi.update_by, yi.share_status, yi.share_value, yi.share_cycle, yi.thumbnail FROM yw_idle yi WHERE id = #{idleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yw_idle ( id, `name`, description, price, num, type_id, production_date, production_place, guarantee_date, extent, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, share_status, share_value, share_cycle, thumbnail ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{num}, #{typeId}, #{productionDate}, #{productionPlace}, #{guaranteeDate}, #{extent}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), null, 'NOTLOCK', #{shareValue}, #{shareCycle}, #{thumbnail} )
mapper.update:

`name`= #{name},

num = #{num},
type_id = #{typeId},
